original_text: As soon as Jesus was baptized, he went up out of the water. At that moment heaven was opened, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove and alighting on him.
korean_text: 예수께서 세례를 받으시고 곧 물에서 올라오실새 하늘이 열리고 하나님의 성령이 비둘기 같이 내려 자기 위에 임하심을 보시더니

sentences.original_text: As soon as Jesus was baptized
he went up out of the water
At that moment heaven was opened
and he saw the Spirit of God

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분 위에 머무는 것을 보셨다
